Package org.apache.hadoop.crypto

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Decryptor  
    Encryptor  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AesCtrCryptoCodec  
    CipherOption
    Used between client and server to negotiate the cipher suite, key and iv.
    CryptoCodec
    Crypto codec class, encapsulates encryptor/decryptor pair.
    CryptoInputStream
    CryptoInputStream decrypts data.
    CryptoOutputStream
    CryptoOutputStream encrypts data.
    CryptoStreamsTestBase  
    CryptoStreamUtils  
    JceAesCtrCryptoCodec
    Implement the AES-CTR crypto codec using JCE provider.
    JceAesCtrCryptoCodec.JceAesCtrCipher  
    OpensslAesCtrCryptoCodec
    Implement the AES-CTR crypto codec using JNI into OpenSSL.
    OpensslAesCtrCryptoCodec.OpensslAesCtrCipher  
    OpensslCipher
    OpenSSL cipher using JNI.
    OpensslCipher.Transform
    Nested class for algorithm, mode and padding.
    TestCryptoCodec  
    TestCryptoStreams  
    TestCryptoStreams.FakeInputStream  
    TestCryptoStreamsForLocalFS  
    TestCryptoStreamsNormal
    Test crypto streams using normal stream which does not support the additional interfaces that the Hadoop FileSystem streams implement (Seekable, PositionedReadable, ByteBufferReadable, HasFileDescriptor, CanSetDropBehind, CanSetReadahead, HasEnhancedByteBufferAccess, Syncable, CanSetDropBehind)
    TestCryptoStreamsWithOpensslAesCtrCryptoCodec  
    TestOpensslCipher  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CipherSuite
    Defines properties of a CipherSuite.
    CryptoProtocolVersion
    Versions of the client/server protocol used for HDFS encryption.
    OpensslCipher.AlgMode
    Currently only support AES/CTR/NoPadding.
    OpensslCipher.Padding  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnsupportedCodecException
    Thrown to indicate that the specific codec is not supported.
